thread.section_title: Homestay.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Homestay.com | homestay.com
thread.title: Anita

author: Anita
title: Anita
text:
I recommend Homestay to search for one's ideal holiday accommodation. I found the site very easy to navigate and the response time to load images on my slow ADSL line much better than other sites.
I like the way how one moves your cursor over the map of the area and then easily see the accommodation on offer.
The host which we chose was excellent and she promptly answered all our questions. No wonder her response rate is stated as 100%
